author: schmendrick
title: John-Boy Walton would be proud of him
review:
This is another pretty gift-set. My son was very excited to find a little boy minifigure in the box. And yes, this boy is really smaller than the adult minifigs. Cool thing. By the way: This little farmer boy is the only Duplo figure which has not been feeded to the shark. Yet...

Bright side of the moon:
+ Little boy with movable cap (you can turn it around)
+ Wheelbarrow
+ Surprisingly high amount of bricks

Dark side of the moon:
- Piglet is fixed on a plate
